tuv.seg: Looking for work: education and training
Ag lorg oibre: oideachas agus oiliúint
If you are about to lose your job or if you are unemployed you could consider going back to education or training
Má tá tú ar tí do phost a chailleadh nó má tá tú dífhostaithe, d'fhéadfá breathnú ar filleadh ar oideachas nó ar oiliúint
You can continue your education or take part in a training course in order to develop your skills, either within the formal school and college system or outside of it
Is féidir leanúint le do chuid oideachais nó páirt a ghlacadh i gcúrsa oiliúna chun do chuid scileanna a fhorbairt, laistigh de chóras na scoile agus na gcoláistí nó lasmuigh de
Qualifax provides comprehensive information on further and higher education and training courses
Tugann Qualifax eolas cuimsitheach ar bhreis oideachais agus ardoideachais agus ar chúrsaí oiliúna
They include different types of courses some of which lead to qualifications while others do not
Ina measc tá cineálacha éagsúla de chúrsaí a bhfuil cáilíochtaí mar thoradh ar roinnt acu cé nach bhfuil cáilíochta ag roinnt eile
The database includes information for adult learners and recognition of prior learning with links to college and other education/training websites
Cuimsíonn an bunachar sonraí faisnéis d'fhoghlaimeoirí fásta agus aitheantas do réamhfhoghlaim a bhfuil naisc orthu le láithreáin ghréasáin choláistí agus oideachais/oiliúna eile
Training and education courses for unemployed people
Oiliúint agus cúrsaí oideachais do dhaoine dífhostaithe
The Springboard Programme provides higher education places for unemployed people on a range of part-time courses from Levels 6 to 9 on the National Framework of Qualifications
Cuireann an Clár Springboard áiteanna ardoideachais do dhaoine dífhostaithe ar raon cúrsaí páirtaimseartha ó Leibhéal 6 go Leibhéal 9 ar an gCreatlach Náisiúnta Cáilíochtaí

Momentum provides free education and training projects to allow long-term jobseekers (who are unemployed for 12 months or more) to gain skills and to access work opportunities in identified growing sectors
Cuireann Momentum tionscadail saoroideachais agus oiliúna ar fáil do chuardaitheoirí fadtéarmacha poist (atá dífhostaithe ar feadh 12 mhí nó níos mó)
The programmes include on-the job training in the form of work experience modules as well as the development of the workplace skills required to obtain and retain employment
Cuimseoidh na cláir oiliúint sa láthair oibre i bhfoirm modúl taithí oibre mar aon le forbairt na scileanna láthair oibre a theastaíonn chun fostaíocht a fháil agus a choimeád
More information is available in our document on Momentum
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise ar fáil inár ndoiciméad faoi Momentum
Skillstowork.ie is a guide for jobseekers and employers to the following Government skills initiatives – Springboard, Momentum, JobBridge, JobsPlus and Skillnets
Is ea Skillstowork.ie treoir do chuardaitheoirí poist agus d’fhostóirí faoi na tionscnaimh Rialtais mar a leanas – Springboard, Momentum, JobBridge, JobsPlus agus Skillnets
The Back to Education Programme can support people getting a social welfare payment to access second-level and third-level education
Is féidir leis an gClár um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas tacú le daoine atá ag fáil íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh rochtain a bheith acu ar oideachas dara leibhéal agus tríú leibhéal
The Part-Time Education Option allows you to keep your Jobseeker's Allowance or Jobseeker's Benefit and attend a part-time day or evening course that will improve your chances of getting a job

Ceadaíonn an Rogha Oideachais Páirtaimseartha thú Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist nó Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist a choinneáil agus freastal ar chúrsa lae páirtaimseartha nó tráthnóna a chuirfidh feabhas ar do sheans post a fháil

The Education, Training and Development Option allows you to keep your jobseeker’s payment and attend a course not covered by the standard Back to Education Allowance, such as a personal development course

Ceadaíonn an Rogha Oideachais, Oiliúna agus Forbartha thú d’íocaíocht cuardaitheora poist a choinneáil agus freastal ar chúrsa nach bhfuil clúdaithe ag an ngnáth Liúntas um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas, cosúil le cúrsa forbartha pearsanta
You don't need formal qualifications in order to take part in many of the full-time and part-time courses that are on offer in the adult education and community education sectors
Ní gá duit cáilíochtaí foirmiúla a bheith agat chun páirt a ghlacadh in an-chuid de na cúrsaí lánaimseartha agus páirtaimseartha atá ar fáil sna hearnálacha oideachais aosaigh agus oideachais phobail
Adult education courses can include further and third-level education or continuing education and training
Is féidir le cúrsaí oideachais aosaigh breis oideachas nó oideachas tríú leibhéal nó oideachas agus oiliúint leanúnach a chuimsiú
The range of courses available includes both part-time and full-time courses
Áirítear an raon de chúrsaí ar fáil cúrsaí páirtaimseartha agus lánaimseartha araon
Community education refers to adult education and learning, generally outside the formal education sector
Tagraíonn oideachas pobail d’oideachas agus d’fhoghlaim aosach, taobh amuigh d'earnáil an oideachais fhoirmiúil go ginearálta
It promotes personalised learning and flexibility within the learning group
Cuireann sé foghlaim phearsantaithe agus solúbthacht chun cinn laistigh den ghrúpa foghlama
There are a number of sources of information on returning to education which can tell you more about the courses which may be available to you
Tá roinnt foinsí eolais maidir le filleadh ar oideachas agus is féidir tuilleadh eolais a thabhairt duit ar na cúrsaí a d'fhéadfadh a bheith ar fáil duit
The Education and Training Boards (ETBs), SOLAS and other agencies fund a number of continuing education and training programmes
Tugann na Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO), SOLAS agus gníomhaireachtaí eile maoiniú do roinnt cláir oideachas agus oiliúna leanúnacha
ETBs organise second-level, adult, community and second chance education
Eagraíonn BOO oideachas dara-leibhéal, oideachas do dhaoine fásta, oideachas pobail agus oideachas athdheise
You can contact your local ETB for more details
Is féidir leat teagmháil a dhéanamh le do BOO áitiúil le haghaidh tuilleadh sonraí
They also operate the Vocational Training and Opportunities Scheme (VTOS) which provides a range of courses to meet the education and training needs of unemployed people
Oibríonn siad an Scéim Oiliúna agus Deiseanna Gairmoideachais (SODG) freisin a chuireann réimse cúrsaí ar fáil chun freastal ar na riachtanais oideachais agus oiliúna atá ag daoine dífhostaithe
Further Education and Training (FET) courses offer you an opportunity to develop or upgrade your skills in the commercial and industrial sectors if you are unemployed or redundant
Tugann cúrsaí Breisoideachais agus Oiliúna (FET) deis duit do chuid scileanna a fhorbairt nó a uasghrádú sna hearnálacha tráchtála agus tionsclaíocha má tá tú dífhostaithe nó iomarcach
You can search online for training courses
Is féidir leat cuardach a dhéanamh ar líne le haghaidh cúrsaí oiliúna
Traineeships offer you a mixture of on-the-job training with an employer and off-the job training in a training centre
Cuireann cúrsaí oiliúna meascán d'oiliúint ar an láthair le fostóir chomh maith le hoiliúint lasmuigh den láthair oibre san Ionad Oiliúna duit
You can take part in a course if you are either a first-time jobseeker or unemployed
Is féidir leat páirt a ghlacadh i gcúrsa má tá tú ag cuardach poist don chéad uair nó má tá tú dífhostaithe
Local training initiatives provide full-time work experience and training which is run by local community groups
Soláthraíonn tionscnaimh oiliúna áitiúla taithí oibre agus oiliúint lánaimseartha atá á reáchtáil ag grúpaí pobail áitiúla
Community Training Centres are independent community-based organisations
Is eagraíochtaí neamhspléach pobal-bhunaithe iad na hIonaid Oiliúna Pobail
They look after the training and employment needs of early school leavers, primarily aged between 16 and 21
Tugann siad aire do na riachtanais oiliúna agus fostaíochta atá ag daoine atá tar éis an scoil a fhágáil go luath, go príomha idir 16 agus 21 bliain

If you are between 15 and 20 years of age and have left school without any formal qualifications, the Youthreach programme will provide you with opportunities for basic education, personal development, vocational training and work experience

Má tá tú idir 15 agus 20 bliana d’aois agus má tá tú tar éis an scoil a fhágáil gan cháilíochtaí foirmiúla ar bith, tugann an clár Youthreach deiseanna duit oideachas bunúsach, forbairt phearsanta, gairmoiliúint agus taithí oibre a fháil
Agencies such as Fáilte Ireland, Bord Iascaigh Mhara (BIM), Teagasc, Coillte and the Crafts Council of Ireland offer you a range of specialist courses in their specific areas of work
Tugann gníomhaireachtaí cosúil le Fáilte Ireland, Bord Iascaigh Mhara (BIM), Teagasc, Coillte agus Comhairle Ceardaíochta na hÉireann raon cúrsaí speisialta duit ina gcuid réimsí oibre féin
Other organisations such as Centres for the Unemployed, Family Resource Centres and Local Development Companies also provide training
Soláthraíonn eagraíochtaí eile cosúil le hIonaid do Dhaoine Dífhostaithe, le hIonad Acmhainní Teaghlaigh agus le Cuideachtaí Forbartha Áitiúla oiliúint freisin
Skillnets networks offer some training to eligible unemployed people
Cuireann líonraí Skillnets roinnt oiliúint ar fáil do dhaoine dífhostaithe incháilithe
If you are unemployed you will not pay for this training
Má tá tú dífhostaithe ní íocfaidh tú as an oiliúint seo
You can search for training courses on the Skillnets website
Is féidir leat cuardach a dhéanamh ar chúrsaí oiliúna ar láithreán gréasáin Skillnets
Training and work experience
Oiliúint agus taithí oibre
The JobBridge, National Internship Scheme is aimed at unemployed people who have been either getting a jobseeker's payment or signing for credits for at least 3 months
Tá an JobBridge, an Scéim Intéirneachta Náisiúnta dírithe ar dhaoine dífhostaithe ag fáil íocaíochta cuardaitheora poist nó ag síniú i gcomhair creidmheasanna ar feadh 3 mhí ar a laghad.
The Work Placement Programme offers work experience and you may be able to keep your social welfare payment
Cuireann Socrúcháin Oibre taithí oibre ar fáil, agus d'fhéadfá a bheith in ann d'íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a choimeád
Employment schemes such as Community Employment and Tús provide short-term work opportunities for unemployed people
Soláthráíonn scéimeanna fostaíochta, mar shample, Fostaíochta Pobail agus Tús deiseanna oibre gearrthéarmach do dhaoine dífhostaithe
You can read more in our document, Schemes to support employment
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise ar fáil inár ndoiciméad, Scéimeanna chun tacú le fostaíocht
